description: Wild spot for one vehicle on a newly built gravel road right next to the sea. they built a house next to but nobody was there.

name: Croatia/Bosnia Border Crossing
description: Border Crossing between Croatia and Bosnia

name: Clearing at a hut
description:
Small clearing at a Hut. No one here at pre-season. Easier access than the place nearby. No 4x4, no ground clearance required and not muddy when it rained.

No facilities.

name: On a meadow
description: Nice, quiet place near the NP. The terrain is grassy with small hills around. The place is level. Beautiful views. Some houses are in the area, but nobody came.

name: fishing club shelter
description:
Shelter whit few old table
Nice and quiet
Some locals showed me this place
Place for fire

name: Camp Velebit
description:
Nice, quiet, family runned campsite. Also renting out little hobbit huts, as theme of campsite is Hobbitland. BBQ available. Laundry service available (charge).
€12pp/n for tent; off season the drinks are paid in form of donation.
Very nice and helpful the owner, speaks english.

name: Water
description:
Fresh water, drinking water, from a quell. 
With a info>drinking-water, good to fill kanister or bottles.

name: Izletiste Delnicki potok
description:
Just outside of Delnice, at some watersources (old swimming pool?), is a picnic area. OK for 1 tent as the ground is a bit bumpy.
Might be no roaming or wifi; once we restarted phones it worked though. Village with Supermarket can also be reached by walking...or driving.
BBQ area available, and tables and benches.

name: Autohrvatska Pula
description:
Just after the bus terminal, before petrol station. Selling wheel bearings, Niko speaks english. Super helpful as we could use their tools to change bearings of the motorbike then and there. Saturdays (weekends) closed!
Amphitheatre in walking distance

name: free water
description: just a water source on the hill, near Udbina

name: Plaža Nerežišća
description:
Lovely little beach with space for two or three offroader. Entry from the road is a bit steep with a sharp corner but makeable with 4x4. 
Place is even. Perfect for a tent or car with rooftop tent.
Wouldn't go there with a van or bigger. 
No one came by on a sunny day in may.

name: Wohnmobil service Nottebohm
description:
Repair service caravan
Repair service mobile homes
tire service
winter storage option
https://wsnulf.jimdofree.com/

name: Villa Lavandula
description:
Excellent place for bikers!  Great location, 100m from the sea, close to the restaurants and shops. Lock up garage for motorcycles, vans and cars. Free wifi, outdoor jacuzzi, gym, sauna. great location,close to the beach restaurants and shops.
The owner is a biker and he's super nice. He gives 40-50% discount for the motorcyclists in low season (March-May, September - October).

name: Aloa Carcamp
description:
Aloa campsite, located about 5km outside of Bol. Very nice little place in the middle of the pine forest. super friendly staff. Possibility to do laundry. On the small beach is a bar with very good pizzas and burgers. Were here with our truck >3.5 tons.
€32.-/night.

name: Quiet Bay View
description: Down a steep gravel, unmarked track there is a small gravel off-take with a flat surface. It is hidden by bushes and has the best island/sea view. not suitable for cars or vans. perfect for motorbikes and tents. The track leads to a small rocky beach. We saw a couple of people out on a walk, no one minded we were there.

name: komolac Ina GAZ
description: We refilled our little bottle of camping gas (1.8 kg/ 40kn). Adapter was there, No problem that we did not have any with us.

name: Rough track with abandoned boat
description:
This is a rough track to get, only walking, carrying the bike or MTB. There is an abandoned boat, giving some cover from the track and adding some thematics to your overnight. Some people pass jogging or walking, but don't mind.

Please check the floor and use a tarp, the floor has dry and hard plants, and a few of them have thorns. But still possible to camp.

name: Olive trees in front of calm bay
description:
There is a small plantation of olive trees on land steps, so the higher you go, the more hidden. It looks like something public, because a person came up in the morning to get some sun and I saw a broken dog leash on the floor.
There is a passage for people below, but the trees offer a very good cover.
Direct access to the water.

name: Over the hill
description:
Quiet dirt road. Over the hill with sunset view and bay view. Some areas to pitch a tent or two but very rocky. 
4x4 best, especially due to sharp rocks.

name: Automoto gume (ex Duras) Dubrovnik
description:
Super helpful tire repair service, very professional equipped. Can change tube tires and works perfectly. Very friendly! If you need a motorbike mechanic ask him, I'm sure he will help! Open from 8am till 4pm. 
Caution! The Google routing is wrong, take this coordinates and drive through the bark down to the shop.
At the moment because of the war in Ukraine there is no chance to get tires here, you have to get them from Germany for example...
https://vulkanizerdubrovnik.hr/

name: In the bush
description: Three spaces in the bush where you can park your car and set up a tent. The road is quite rocky but ok with 2wd. You  need to pass the electric pylone and you'll find the spot.

name: Grassy area close to the ferry boat
description:
Quiet place close to the harbour, follow the gravel road (to the beach). You need to open a gate and close it for the sheeps 
Many places above the trees in the shade

name: Beach Camp
description: Lovely spot next to the beach after passing a slightly rocky piste.

name: National Forest
description: 4 wheels need. Good place in the Park close to a waterfall. Hidden, Alone in the middle of the trees.

name: Restoran "Pri staroj vuri"
description: Very good restaurant. We had the zagred vienna steack it was great, Big portion, good desert.

name: in the bush
description: Small area in the right side, close to the entrance of the NP.

name: Sosice
description: Water in the middle of a very quiet village

name: camp ctt
description:
Small campsite right on the coast. Very friendly owners. Hot shower, Tollets all very clean
We paid 28 euro for camper and 2 people no electric.

name: Peruca lake
description: Nice spot around the lake, with panoramic view. Very quiet. Easy to drive on the gravel road with 2wd.

name: Quarry
description: A quiet place with clear sea and stone beach. no 4x4 needed

name: waterside grass field
description: very nice Spot directly by se sea. Used as a parking Slot by many locals during the day and a few people stayed the night. the ocean ist beautiful we were here for two nights and had no issues with the Police or Something. Very quiet and chilled.

name: INA Fuel and Water Fillstation
description: We asked the stuff of the gasstation to fill up the water. Give them 20 kuna and they are happy. Super friendly and good water. Were here twice.

name: old Military airbase next to the see
description: direktly at the see!! you have to Go a but of Road but it is easy even with a sporty Car!

name: Juniper fields near Krka waterfalls
description: Had a fantastic and quiet night here right beside a small gravel road. Some locals passed by by foot, on a bike and one in a car during night, no one bothered. Hundred meters away we can hear sheeps and their shepherds.

name: Auto Servis Marko Ančić
description: Friendly mechanic that could help us right away with some engine troubles.

name: Roundabout
description: At the end of a log road (partly steep and rocky-4wd recommended and high clearance necessary) is a 'roundabout'. From here, several hiking trails start. VERY quiet!!!

name: Camping Robeco
description: Great campsite! Big terrain with fruit- and nut trees. Clean ablution and swimming pool. 10 euro pppn.

name: Good Energy Camping
description: Basic campsite next to the main road (Sign says 'family camp' and the entrance is very easy to miss). Toilets are clean and there is 1 shower. Not much shade. Quite some traffic noise during day and night and many mosquitos! Opposite the camping are many fruit stalls with delicious fruit. Pcice: 160 HKR or 20 euro for 1 car and 2 persons (cash only).

name: Harbour parking
description: 20kn per hour. Big Parking lot with plenty of space. Uber to old town is 45-50kn.

name: Brgat Gornji
description: Easy border crossing. Croatian side only scans passport and Bosnian side only stamps them.

name: Gradina modric
description: Hilltop clearing above a little village, overlooking the sea and mountain.  Only 4 minutes from highway.   A fixed picnic bench gave us the perfect spot for breakfast.  Very quiet and peaceful.  There is also the remains of an old fortress wall.

name: Gradina Modric
description: 4 minutes from highway, on top of a hill near a small village, overlooking the sea, remains of a old settlement rock wall.   Very quiet and clean.

name: Bridge on Zrmanja
description: Bridge not sutible for crossing of larger vechicles then cars and small vans. Hight less then 2,8m and Widht less then 2,2m. no markings.

name: Abandoned Military Base
description: When you get to the food place called GUSAR turn right and you can find a spot anywhere.  If you stay to the left…go to the end and you will hit an old 18-century building. For now it is open to walk through. Also there is a really nice quiet beach by GUSAR place.

name: Off road, beautiful view of sea and mountains
description: This spot is of the side of a dirt road.  Super quiet.

name: Duda I mate
description: Really nice place run by a family : hotel and restaurant. Amazing sea food. Owner speaks French. Really nice people. 50€ for 2 persons 1 room great breakfast included high season

name: Zagreb - Roadside
description: Roadside parking next to park and playing fields. Free. Some road noise but OK overnight.  Felt safe and not as trashy or dirty as some of the city's overnight spots. Near tram station. Very busy and difficult to get a space between 7.30am and 6pm. The city zoo is nearby.

name: Toilets & Vidikovac Cafe in the Park
description: An oasis in the bustle of the city and great if you are stopping nearby the park. Very clean public Toilets and a water fountain behind the cafe.

name: Camp Marintino?
description:
This camp may have been shut down by the authorities - I don't read Croatian, but there's alot of blue hazard tape. 
However, there is running water, toilets and showers and you can still stay here at your own risk for 15 euros. A nice view, a strip of beach, shade, level pitches, water, toilets, showers. Road noise. Good for a night. A Bar/grill is nearby at the entrance to the camp.

name: Hidden place near the borderline
description: Storage space at the station area.  Near the street.  Not necessarily nice but sufficient for one night.

name: Camp Delfin
description: Full service campground with lots of amenities.  Lovely lady, Danica, runs it.  Very busy even in mid September.  Good WiFi, clean bathrooms, sinks for dish washing and laundry as well as a washer to use.  4G reception.  Traffic noise as it's between the road and the beach. Beach bar and chairs/umbrellas to rent. 25 euros a night for 2 adults and motorhome (+1.50 per day pp govt tax).

name: Camping Old Fabric
description: Big Place.  Good to Stay for one night.

name: Auto Centar Rovinj
description: super nice, helpful guy.  He lent me a wrench so I could fix myself. Ordered and bought the parts from him. Speaks many languages.

name: Babic
description: You can parking with a camper for free when you go eat in the restaurant

name: camping klenovica
description: pretty big car camping complex. camping available right on the ocean. paid 30 euro 1 night 2 tents 2 motorbikes

name: Camp Kozica
description: Beautiful camp, plenty of shade, dogs welcome, beach is rocky with some pebbled places. Toilets are clean.

name: sky view
description: Quiet place beutiful panorama 4x4 will be a good thing here

name: Boban Campsite
description: Nice camping with a lot of trees, space, access to the beach, showers and warm water. So far, the cheapest campsite we’ve encountered in this area! Van can get access to electricity but you can also use the ones near bathrooms.

name: Natura Camp Karli
description:
small campground, offering a few places for vans, tent pitches in an olive yard and a few glamping huts
campsite looks newly built (09/2022)
nice common kitchen and area in an open wooden shelter
staff was very welcoming and friendly
quiet location outside a small village

name: Top of the hill with great view
description:
4 wheel drive mandatory….. great views over murter and betina bay.
Bring a shot of whiskey and enjoy .

name: Izlicic
description: Small family camp with friendly prices. A lot of shades and about 800 m from the sea.

name: Apartmani Jozič
description: Very clean and good place. accept euros but no change in euros. motor or car can be parked behind the gate. I paid 16 euros for 1 night.

name: Camp Kalebic
description:
Direct at the Mediterran Sea
Nice Place 
With all you Need

name: Camp Omišalj
description: Full service campground, including excellent wifi, electrical power 220V

name: free parking
description: A place you can leave your car for free. We also slept one night at this place. It's not a very nice place but it works for one night. Not so far from the harbor an the city.

name: Park entrance water tap
description:
The other water fountain is no longer available due to Security and the boom they installed.
Here is another spot to get clean fresh and cold water.
Asked Security, as friendly as Croation Securities are :)

My GPS data not 100% correct, drive till road ends.

name: Automehaničarska radionica AS
description: Very friendly Ukrainian Mechanics working there. Constructed a metal part to install my self brought mirror for the right vehicle side. Now easily adjustable and holds strong. Automehaničarska radionica AS +385 98 177 0623 https://autoservis-split.com

name: nudist camp
description: nice nudist campground for tents and rv with shadow places and friendly stuff.

name: Free parking area
description: Parked here for 4 hours, no problems. Only 10 spots available

name: Brodo Split - Football Field
description: Free parking above football fields - roughly 200 spots available.

name: Quiet spot between the olive trees in beautiful valley
description:
If driving to Dubrovnik drive into the valley on the left site just past the pizza place on the road. Easy fit for a motorbike, cars not sure.

Valley has beautiful lakes and many great camping spots. Even left my stuff when I went for a bite in the next town. Didn't see another human.

name: Public spring
description: In a small village. Good pressure, Good parking

name: Gradsko
description: free parking spot near the marina, Porec.

name: secluded spot near Krka national park
description: Great private spot accessible from the dirt road at east side of the lozovac entrance parking lot. You can can see it clearly on the satellite image. There's a sign that states video surveillance for the preservation of nature but nothing about no camping. road is good not a single person here in the off season.

name: Plaža Letavica
description: Nice secluded parking lot next to a public shore. No "no camping" signs. Not sure if camping here in summer is possible. Only small rigs!

name: Forest
description: Road to old oil pump, 5min from highway, empty and good quality. Quiet at night just frogs and birds. Little trash place.

name: Camp Riviera Makarska
description: Nice and peaceful camp site at the entrance of Makarska. Pitches are equipped with water and electricity, terraced and surrounded by pine trees, which might be difficult for bigger vans. We (6,40m) hab no problems. There are hot showers, toilets and dish washing facilities as well as a chemical toilet drop and a grey water drop. Everything is clean.

name: Fort Kličevace
description: Spot near old fort in the forest. Clean and quite. Good for hiking.

name: Jarun lake
description:
Parking overnight has a specific charge (150 Kuna) and the person at the entrance called this camping.
We assumed that meant staying on a parking lot which we did with our roof top tent. We saw just one other (RV) camper. Relatively quiet spot with great swimming and shower to rinse afterwards. Toilettes. Open air gym. Table tennis. Restaurants. Safe place. 6km Bike ride from down town.

name: Autocamp Padova
description: Established campground with spaces for campers and tents. Beachside and also has a pool, bakery, restaurant. Cost 24 euros for two people, two motorcycles, and one tent for one night.

name: Sunset beach canteen kantina
description: Nice owner of the bar. You can stay overnight for some €. Legally and extremely quiet. Two very nice beaches. One for sunrise. One for sunset. Big rigs no problem.

name: robert2
description: I ate there, the staff is very friendly and speaks English.  an address to remember in the region

name: Quiet place next to a cemetery
description: Quiet. far from houses. hidden thanks to a hill. no view. just for one night. next to the second cemetery of the town.

name: julia gueat house
description: good n secure inside garage parking for motorcycle at the back of the guest house, 35 euro for big bed room for 3 and inside kitchen , loundry machine , 1 kqueen bed 1 small bed , clean , friendly owner , very good wifi , balcon view to the sea ,stunning view

name: Savski gaj apartment
description: this place near the biggest mall in zagreb the arena , very clean , back yard secure with gate free parking for motorcycle and cars , 35 euro for single bed very clean share bathroom, neighbourhood very safe ...very recomended they also have inside bedroom

name: Wild camping in mountains overlooking ocean
description: Amazing wild camping spot! On both sides of the road there’s space for multiple vans. Very rocky so tent camping probably isn’t possible. 4x4 not necessary. Absolutely gorgeous scenery and views - don’t pass this spot up!

name: Secluded spot off gravel road
description:
Update: I would only recommend this spot if you have a 4x4. It’s quite tricky to get into and out of. Nice spot but hard to say if it’s worth the effort 

I was looking for a spot at the peak of the mountain but ended up turning off on this unmarked gravel path to see if I could find something. I found a nice little spot for 1 van, fairly even and great views. I was able to do it in dry conditions with my VW California but a 4x4 would be ideal

name: Šibenik, Brodarica
description: Camp Sani. Small camp for RV,s (all sizes), trailers and tents. Close to beach (5 minute walk). 10 minutes drive to Lidl, Konzum, Plodine, Kaufland and harbour. Quiet and all parcels in shade, electricity and wather on each parcel. Clean bathroom adn toilets. Free use of frisges and grill.

name: Ruins of an old chapel - Africa feeling
description:
The campspot is easy accesible by car, bike or pick-up.
It is directly next to the ruins of the chapel. 
Parking space for at least 4 cars, pick-ups. No amenities - no water or toilet.
With the surrounding nature you get a bit of Africa-feeling :)

name: old concrete place
description: plenty of space, you'll hear the nearby road a bit

name: Prima Laundry Service
description: Self service laundry 1x18kg 2x 13kg machine with dryer - inside of Andrea shopping mall - open 8-21 - free Wi-Fi

name: Camp Spacva
description: Car Park area just beyond Lorry park at sevice station. No facilities but can use service station. Surprisingly quite given its location just beyond border crossing into Croatia. Site is marked on Garmin Explore map.

name: Behind a dam
description: Very quiet and private place below a dam, next to a field with great views of nearby mountains and not visible from any roads. Just drop down the slope on the farmer's track. We camped right on the grassy track.

name: Camp Borovik
description: Free camping in front of cafe or along the lake. Level ground suitable for tents. Can use restaurant toilets. Restaurant may not be open in evenings.

name: truckstop A1
description:
water
free wifi in shop
toilets
food
clean
huge

good for one night passing by.

name: Auto Sport Granda
description:
Propane refills. Found on Google maps and there was a comment that somebody got their US propane tank refilled. They refilled my UK Calor gas propane cylinder and had the adaptors to do it.
4KG cylinder was €14.60
I got there at 8:55 on a Monday and two guys were there. Although the guy who took my payment said I was lucky that the other guy was there to do the refill. Not sure what that means.

name: Kapetanova Kuca - Sarengrad
description:
Kapetanova Kuca (Capatain’s House) is a great place to stay before leaving into Serbia or when entering into Croatia. Dinka, the owner, is a kind elder lady who allows you to stay and camp and camp for free. You can use the bathroom, the kitchen and common room as well. :) 

It’s about 15 kilometres from the border and you can arrive it easily by bike, car and kayak. 

As she is also working with the locals children, a small donation to support her activities would be great!

name: Cascade Wild Camp
description: Quite place next to a cascade, flat places on gras, LTE Internet ok

name: grasso park in front of the sea
description: Nice spot in front of the sea with some trees. we stayed for One night and nobody came.

name: Nature Camping Peruča
description: Small established nature campground. Partial forested spots with a lot of shade and partial open fields. Free spot choice, not numbered blocks. Some spots have electrical. Small facilities but clean. Not catering to large caravans. Walking distance to Lake Peruca. It was super quiet and super shady. Great little campground.

name: Secluded with a view
description:
An flat open space about 15x15 meters with a view. The dirt road leading here seems to be used very rarely. The starting point is at 45.603341N, 17.516171E and it goes over a small stream of water. I think most 2WD cars can drive here, at least in dry conditions, and certainly AWD cars. It probably also works for medium size trucks with 4WD since the dirt road seems to be used for logging.

There is cell phone coverage.

name: beautiful terrain
description: beautiful terrain along a gravel track. splendid view of the sea and the villages below. no surrounding dwellings. very calm

name: Plaža Kamenice
description: Hippie camp just above the beach bar, it has a stream of water, a shower, a toilet and a nudist beach next to it.

name: Pod Svetim Jurom
description:
Little Hiker Stop with Eat & Sleep possibility. (13 €)
Perfect for motorbikers!
You'll need a sleeping bag.

name: Riwer Hostel
description:
Basic but unproblematic hostel, stayed here after being rained out. Tourist registration included. €30 for a dorm bed, sheets and towel included, owner and other guests seem nice.
Allowed to lock my bike to railings in the stairwell.

name: RABike
description: Nice little bike shop, good selection of parts for such a small island. I stopped for a replacement road tyre, didn't try the servicing.

name: Big Yellow House
description:
Relaxed, low-key, alternative-style resort offering camping spaces. Good camping ground in a shady forest above the beach. Great beach access, area with deck chairs/sun loungers, bar serving coffee and cocktails. Friendly international staff.
Meals also provided but I didn't try them.
Limited kitchen access: fridge space and a few outdoor hobs.
Also has apartments but these seem to require advance booking.
They seemed a bit surprised when I turned up without a reservation but let me camp for €19/night. Tents only.

name: Pitka voda
description: sign indicates this is drinking water next to a picnic bench in the shade under a tree

name: Farm stay
description: what a fantastic place! an old ( poor ) farm with sheep , chickens and dogs ... everything runs free in nature . Ideal for 4x4, their property is vast and you choose a spot with a wonderful view. 10€ / night . you are best completely self-sufficient

name: sous les pins
description:
Translation: A little on the heights, large area under the pines to pitch your tent. Quiet and in the shade. A few revelers heard in the distance. A few joggers in the morning who didn't say anything to us.
We stayed for one night on August 16, 2023.
We accessed this place with our bikes. It is possible to come by van (it is a stony path but quite wide). Not accessible to campers.

Un peu sur les hauteurs, large zone sous les pins pour planter sa tente. Calme et à l'ombre. Quelques fêtards entendus au loin. Quelques joggeurs le matin qui ne nous ont rien dit.
Nous avons dormi une nuit le 16 août 2023.
Nous avons accéder à ce lieu avec nos vélos. Il est possible de venir en van (c'est un chemin caillouteux mais assez large). Non accessible au camping car.

name: Mountain River between small villages
description:
Between small villages in the (not that high) mountains there is this river. Very cold water. No tourists seen, locals go here to chill and take a walk, but they seemed chill.

Road easily accessible by 2x4, big rigs may be at some places possible, but due to the bushes coming in to the way to the spot, it’s up to you. Could also be muddy with much rain (then may be a 4x4 better). 

There are multiple spots between this two villages, you’ll see them. 

Take your trash.

name: City center drinkable
description: Drinkable water in the city Centre. All good

name: nice place for camping, food, Shower, etc
description: Nice place for camping, food, Shower,water,etc

name: small forrest plateau near road
description: Easy accessible with a car over a short country road and a concrete bridge. Also a caravan or maybe 2 could fit in. The bridge crosses a small river, but that water is not accesible. The place is quiet, pretty flat and not visible from the main road. The grass was cut wenn we stayed. There is a litte bit of shadow if you place the tent right. Enough place for 2 tents and 2 cars or maybe 3 if small.

name: Camping and Mini Pet Farm Brcko
description: Small campground with a few places. 6 for motorhomes and vans and a few for tents and off-road rigs. Very friendly owner, welcomes you on the site, if he is not there, he is probably at work on the fields around the campsite. No reservations, first come first serve. Beautiful and quiet getaway for stops. Fee 12 EUR per person, electricity at 6, small amount of electricity 3 EUR. There is a common point to charge phones.

name: Autocamp MATEA
description: Small camp by the Sea, with direct access to beach. Dog friendly. Up to 20 camping parcels. Owners nice and helpfull. Showers new and clean, same as sanitary. Bring your own toilet paper. Been there for weeak, 2 persons, 6 meters RV, and dog, 40 euro day.

name: Autocamp Paron Šime
description: Small campground within pine trees, steps away from the beach, always clean, good price (cheaper than the bigger one next door), family run and super friendly owner

name: lost place parking
description: lost places, 4 hotel are lost places, very crazy and history, quit and very dark in the night, direktly beach, public shower nearly by the coffee

name: Camp Korita
description: Very nice campground behind the Plitvica Vrela restaurant. Dump station, garbage,water & hot showers and electricity. We paid 36 Euros for a camper van. The restaurant has excellent pizza 🍕.

name: Materada sea front
description: This is a large wooded area just behind the seafront. When I arrived at 15:00 hours it was full of locals and I didn’t see another foreign vehicle. I asked the locals, the jet ski business and the cafe on the sea front if it was ok to stay the night. They all said yes and I was offered a key to the cafe toilet. I tried campsites before arriving here but they were either stupid money, or I had to get my kit off and expose my nads to all on a nudist site! Arrive with everything you need or use the cafe in front of the Hotel Materada which is priced for locals

name: water
description: fresh water by the street, parking possible

name: Poljana Quay
description: I’m parked right on the dock next to the boats. I asked 3 locals if it was ok and none said no. There is only room for smaller vans and not XL wheelbase ones. It is an incredible location with a hotel/restaurant right next door and a local shop and pizzeria 200 metres away

name: Zuljana Camping
description:
This site is located 20 metres back from the beach and right in the middle of the village, close to a convenience store, bars and restaurants. 

The facilities are basic but clean, but only 2 showers, 4 toilets and 2 sinks for a site that could take 20 vans when full. But the location makes up for the basic minimum facilities

name: Camp Lokve
description: nice little place in great nature. we payed 20 EU in June. 2 person with a camper.

name: Laik House
description:
an old house in the Dalmatia interior, 50 km from the cost.

44.070735,

name: Weingut Monte Rosso
description: New moble home parking space, 2 toilets, 1 shower, dishwashing, electricity, dumping station. Everything is new and the owner very friendly.

name: Celopek Apartment
description:
Has 2 apartments which have 2 bedrooms, and  there is a studio, and they have 2 rooms on the very large property. 
it is first class ,modern with a nice bathroom  and spacious kitchen and  it all looks fairly new. First class and spotless in a great location near the air base +- 3 km. with a huge lawn area where you can relax. The dinner €20 was absolutely delicious, BBQ Trout with trimmings and a salad and then a desert of pumpkin pie.  The owners are very nice, speak English and cook the food. The apartment was €40 but I am solo on a bike.

name: Ciban family farm
description:
Grasfield on the top of a hill. It belongs to a vineyard. You will have great view all around. Price is 10€ and this includes a bottle of wine.  There are no utilities. The owners are very friendly and speak English. We had a really nice time here. 

We stayed here with a expedition truck (4-2,5-8,5m). Our gps lead us true the touristic route. It fits but it is really narrow. You can better come from the south. It will lead you straight up to the spot. 

PS at the end of September/ beginning of October there is a festival that’s called Dani Vina (wine days). Really nice to attend and taste great wine from the area. 

Enjoy your stay here.

name: Dolphin spot
description: Here we have seen Dolphins during a boattrip. All the sightseeing boats gathered here. If you have a boat or sub it is worth to checking it out. Time 1800-1900. Good luck.

name: Camping Glavotok
description: Good campground at the water. Water and electricity available. Great spot for snorkeling/diving and enjoying the views and sun. Big rig friendly as we are here with a expedition truck of 9m. Road to the campground is a little small but not really a problem. They have a swimming pool and some bar/restaurant. Also a bakery and playgrounds. Diving school on site. Kayak/bike/scooter/quad rental also available. Closes for winter on 15-10-2023. Will open somewhere halfway of April 2024.

name: White dear ranch.
description: A very nice place at a small bar/restaurant. Very nice local owner how let you stay overnight on his ranch. No utilities. There is a small playground and the have dears. The road up there says max 5t, but we ask and nobody cares. It is for only 300m and our truck of 15t fits easily.

name: Free pitch
description: Isolated place but not too much where the road ends, then there is a field.  There is a small park nearby.  You can hear car noise on the street

name: Hostel Dvor
description: Really nice hostel , very quiet , with breakfast , free coffee , and you can park the bike front of the hostel , but safe ! And really close of old town !

name: Subtub hostel
description: Hostel like hotel , nice place and safe parking for the motorbike

name: Vulco automoto gume Dubrovnik
description: Very friendly , just I changed my rear tire ! Was fast ! And nice service

name: Ante Jukic motorcyle service
description: Really nice workshop for motorcycle , very local . I changed oil there ! Mechanic speak English , I would recommended !

name: Camp Dvor Barban Natura camp Karli.
description: Very nice little camp with only a few pitches under trees. Not all are completely flat but ok. Very quiet, clean toilets, a big fire place for common group camp fire. 17€ for a big rig and 2 adults. Showers in the owners house over the street. Fridge and dish wash.

name: Big House Hotel
description: 4 parking Lots for Camper, View to Green landscape

name: for cyclist only
description: church ev. Marija. a small church with a roof to be protected from the rain. there is a fountain on the main street. take the gravel road next to it. then take the small path on your right hand and you will reach the place. not visible from the street, but you can hear a bit the traffic.

name: Spot on a side beach
description: near a small Town  Nice view on the mountains and quiet

name: Next to river and village
description: Good place to stay for one night at a small river and close to a village. There is a building of a fishing club with small parking in front. With a small Camper you can hide behind some trees and bushes on the riverside. With larger rigs, when parking at the clubhouse, you are in visibility of the village. However, it seems to be ok to stay for a night.
